text: Revaz "Rezo" Chkheidze (; 8 December 1926 - 3 May 2015)კინორეჟისორი რეზო ჩხეიძე გარდაიცვალა was a Georgian movie director. He was known for directing Father of a Soldier and The Saplings, both of which entered at the Moscow Film Festival. He was awarded the title of People's Artist of the USSR in 1980. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Movie directors from Georgia (country) Category:Soviet entertainers
title: Revaz Chkheidze
